## unifyQuickCompletionCRUDAssistant() function

统一请求帮助函数 请求发起函数参数, 配置路由后缀

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function unifyQuickCompletionCRUDAssistant<Req extends object>(configureSuffix: Partial<ConfigureSuffix>, triggerFn: Function): <Res extends QuickCompletionCRUDAssistantResponse<unknown, unknown, unknown, unknown, unknown> = QuickCompletionCRUDAssistantResponse<unknown, unknown, unknown, unknown, unknown>>() => QuickCompletionCRUDAssistant<Req, Res>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  configureSuffix | Partial&lt;[ConfigureSuffix](./servicehelper.configuresuffix.md)<!-- -->&gt; | 配置路由后缀，不配置则使用默认，配置则覆盖默认 |
|  triggerFn | Function | 请求发起函数, 用于识别出请求函数参数 |

**Returns:**

&lt;Res extends [QuickCompletionCRUDAssistantResponse](./servicehelper.quickcompletioncrudassistantresponse.md)<!-- -->&lt;unknown, unknown, unknown, unknown, unknown&gt; = [QuickCompletionCRUDAssistantResponse](./servicehelper.quickcompletioncrudassistantresponse.md)<!-- -->&lt;unknown, unknown, unknown, unknown, unknown&gt;&gt;() =&gt; [QuickCompletionCRUDAssistant](./servicehelper.quickcompletioncrudassistant.md)<!-- -->&lt;Req, Res&gt;

## Example


```ts
const common = unifyQuickCompletionCRUDAssistant({},()=>{})

common().setURL("order").trigger().get({})

common().setURL("menu").trigger().get({})
```
